Name: Mobile phones, motor vehicles, Prohibit
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the use of mobile telephones while operating a motor vehicle.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1. Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-180 to read as follows:
      �19-180 Prohibition on the use of mobile telephones while driving. a. For purposes of this section, the term "mobile telephone" shall mean a telephone which can be used without the use of a telephone jack and is transportable.
      b. It shall be prohibited for the operator of a motor vehicle to use a mobile telephone while operating such motor vehicle on any  street, highway or road in the City.
      c. A violation of this section shall be punishable by a penalty of one hundred dollars.
      �2. This local law shall take effect immediately.







LS#2175
10/20/99
T-1999-14

\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj\ulnone Section 1. Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-180 to read as follows:\par
\ul\'a719-180 Prohibition on the use of mobile telephones while driving. a. For purposes of this section, the term \ldblquote mobile telephone\rdblquote  shall mean a telephone which can be used without the use of a telephone jack and is transportable.\par
b. It shall be prohibited for the operator of a motor vehicle to use a mobile telephone while operating such motor vehicle on any  street, highway or road in the City.\par
c. A violation of this section shall be punishable by a penalty of one hundred dollars.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\ulnone\'a72. This local law shall take effect immediately.\par
